def main():
    n = int(input())
    cheeses = {}
    for i in range(n):
        cheese = input().split()
        if cheese[1] not in cheeses:
            cheeses[cheese[1]] = 0
        cheeses[cheese[1]] += 1
    print(cheeses["soft"] if cheeses["soft"] <= cheeses["hard"] else cheeses["hard"])

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()


def main():
    n = int(input())
    cheeses = {}
    for i in range(n):
        cheese = input().split()
        if cheese[1] not in cheeses:
            cheeses[cheese[1]] = 0
        cheeses[cheese[1]] += 1
    print(cheeses["soft"] if cheeses["soft"] < cheeses["hard"] else cheeses["hard"]

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

n = int(input())
l = []
for i in range(n):
    l.append(input().split()[1])
c = Counter(l)
print(c['soft'] * c['hard'])


from collections import Counter
n = int(input())
c = Counter([input().split()[1] for _ in range(n)])
print(c['soft']*c['hard'])
